tuv.seg: The Dormant Accounts Acts aim to reunite account holders or their next of kin with dormant bank accounts
Tá sé mar aidhm ag Achtanna na gCuntas Díomhaoin cuntais bhainc dhíomhaoine in Éirinn a thabhairt ar ais do shealbhóirí cuntais nó dá neasghaolta
Credit unions are organisations of people that save together and lend to each other at affordable rates of interest
Is eagras é an comhar creidmheasa de dhaoine a chuireann airgead i dtaisce le chéile agus a chuireann iasachtaí airgid ar fáil dá chéile ar ráta úis réasúnta
Financial institutions and identification
Institiúidí airgeadais agus aitheantas
Before you open an account in a financial institution, you must show certain evidence of identity
Pléann an cháipéis seo na cineálacha fianaise aitheantais a bhíonn ag teastáil chun cuntas a oscailt le hinstitiúid airgeadais
Money laundering is a very serious offence
Cion an-tromchúiseach is ea sciúradh airgid in Éirinn
This document looks at the steps that have been taken to combat this crime
Caitheann an cháipéis seo súil ar na bearta a rinneadh chun an choir seo a chomhrac
Opening and switching a bank account
Faigh amach anseo faoi na rialacha maidir le cuntais bhainc a oscailt agus a athrú in Éirinn
Find out what the rules are for opening and switching bank accounts
Faigh comhairle freisin faoi conas an cuntas is oiriúnaí do d’éilimh a oscailt
Central Bank of Ireland
Banc Ceannais na hÉireann
Introduction to the functions and powers of the Central Bank of Ireland
Tá plé déanta sa cháipéis seo ar fheidhmeanna agus cumhachtaí Bhanc Ceannais na hÉireann
Financial transactions with other EU countries
Díospóidí le hinstitiúidí airgeadais i dtíortha eile de chuid an AE
It also gives information on the Single European Payments Area (SEPA) which came into effect on 1 February 2014
Pléann an cháipéis seo Rialachain an AE maidir le bearta airgeadais trasteorann taobh istigh den Chrios Eorpach
The euro is the unit of currency of 18 EU Member States. Background on its introduction
Pléann an cháipéis seo an euro - airgead na 18 ballstáit AE
Find out about the advanced security features which make euro banknotes and coins recognisable and protect against counterfeiting
Déantar cur síos sa doiciméad seo ar shonraí slándála na nótaí agus boinn nua Euro
The National Payments Plan aims to increase electronic forms of payment such as debit cards and electronic banking in Ireland
Is é aidhm an Phlean Náisiúnta Íocaíochtaí cineálacha leictreonacha íocaíochta, ar nós cártaí dochair agus baincéireacht leictreonach, a mhéadú in Éirinn
Rounding of cash transactions will be rolled out from 28 October 2015
Is é is cuntais chaighdeánacha bhainc ann ná cuntais shimplí bhainc nach ngearrtar táillí ná muirir as gnáthsheirbhísí ina leith
An explanation of how rounding will work
Tugtar faisnéis sa doiciméad seo ar thabhairt isteach na gcuntas caighdeánach bainc
Standard bank accounts are simple bank accounts with no fees or changes for normal services
Rolladh amach slánúchán na n-idirbheart airgid ó 28 Deireadh Fómhair 2015 i leith
This document gives information on the introduction of standard bank accounts
Míniú faoin gcaoi ina n-oibreoidh an slánúchán
